Build: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript

April 2022

My Portfolio

A simple website I built to showcase my projects.

Highlights

YouTube API

Using the YouTube API to fetch data and display a list of the videos uploaded in my YouTube channel, and implementing pagination.

Three.js

I used the cross-browser JavaScript 3D library Three.js to display the 3D art I created.

Theme Customization

The user can customize their view of the website by changing the font size, primary color, and the background color. These customization options will be saved in the local storage
